findings.title: A01.Accommodation of Non-ERC20-Compliant Tokens
findings.description: The `transfer` function does not comply with ERC20 standard and may cause issues if not handled properly.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the `SigValidationModule` contract, there is a privileged account, i.e., `owner`, authorized to set addresses for `feeAccount` and `avaultGuard`. This privileged account needs to be scrutinized.
